title: NoSleep Podcast S8 - Holiday Hiatus 2
description:
The show is taking a new year's break this week but we're featuring two tales from our Season Pass 7 episodes.
"Feed the Pig" written by Elias Witherow and performed by Jesse Cornett & Peter Lewis & Erika Sanderson.
Click here to learn more about the voice actors on The NoSleep Podcast 
Click here to learn more about the Sleepless Live 2017 Tour 
Click here to learn more about Elias Witherow 
Executive Producer & Host: David Cummings
Musical score composed by: Brandon Boone
Audio adaptation produced by: Phil Michalski
